description: Creates a system. The system is validated against the entities in the latest version of the user's namespace unless another namespace version is specified in the request.

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: The DefinitionDocument used to create the system. The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value. The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

nested_params.name: language
nested_params.description: The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

parameters.name: compatibleNamespaceVersion
parameters.description: The namespace version in which the system is to be created. If no value is specified, the latest version is used by default.

nested_items.name: revisionNumber
nested_items.description: The revision number of the system.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the system was created.
